mode_details

showConfigurationDetails

Function

Structure

Shell.Project

Type

val showConfigurationDetails : string -> configuration_details

Syntax

showConfigurationDetails config -> details

Arguments

config
A string.

Values

details
A value of type configuration_details.

Description

Shows the details of the configuration specified by config.
